lines.text: I drink to Rebecca Ryan! She's the first real woman I have met in all of France.
What are you trying to tell me? Is she Rebecca Ryan or is she not Rebecca Ryan?
I told you! There is no such person.
But she sat right here!
No! She thinks she's a character in a book. She thinks I'm a character in a book. She even thinks my mother is a character in a book. The woman is crazy!
She is not the only one.
Look, you have got to do something because the priest's death was not an accident. That bullet, and this one, were meant for Rebecca.
The women that does not exist...
No, of course she exists but not as Rebecca!
Because Rebecca does not exist.
Right!
Wrong!
[throws Alan out of his office]
The important thing, kid, is that you're doing something you like to do.
I drink to Rebecca Ryan! She's the first real woman I have met in all of France.
What you are feeling right now is the barrel of 357 combat magnum. This weapon can fell an elephant at a hundred yards, let alone a snake like you, at point blank... HAH!
What happened to your nose?
My nose? Oh... someone just tried to kill me.
They will stop at nothing to keep us from getting on that train.
...so she disappears beneath the surface of the icy water... what happens next?
You know what happened next.
Yes, but we can't tell them that!
Alright. How about, he doesn't want to work anymore, so he carries her off to a turret, high in his castle, and makes mad, passionate love to her.
[He kisses her]

[a pause]
End of chapter!

[Striking an akido pose]
Hah! You're lucky you're still alive.
I'm on a streak.
Does this thing have any pockets in it?
Yes, and until now, no rips.
Don't you understand, I am trying to help you.
I know you're eager to help Dimitri; but this is no time to play the hero.
[she runs off]
I am not playing the hero.
[running after her]
You are playing the goddamn...
[his voice trails off]
To... Mom.
Really put alot of thought into that one, huh Dad?
I'm aware that I haven't been the best... well, the most... well, I am aware of those things.
